question: Vijay Diwas is celebrated on what date every year?
explanation: Vijay Diwas is celebrated in India on December 16 to mark Indiaâ€™s victory over Pakistan in the Indo-Pakistani war of 1971. The day is celebrated to honour the martyrs of the 1971 war between the two countries. On this day in 1971, about 93,000 Pakistani soldiers surrendered to the Indian forces. This historic victory led to creation of Bangladesh.
